name: escape reality.
description:
Husk of a city. Nobodyborough.

Drained sky. Ambient sun. Crushed buildings. Needles of the hedgehog.

Rotting stoat, you're the bile.

Murdered overnight.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Made for GDKO Round 3 using Twine. White room ambience from freesound under CC0, everything else made by 89o.
